body_html:
I opened a question on Stackoverflow to this topic:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/50237486/tf-data-iterator-get-next-how-to-advance-in-tf-while-loop
My problem is that I have to assign the new values to my model.

I also tried the following:

a = tf.Variable(iterator.get_next())
while (...):
    with tf.control_dependency([tf.assign(a, iterator.get_next())]):
        minimize(...)

However, this did not work as well. I still did not get other values in operations using a.
Unfortunately my model is too big to share it here.

body:
I opened a question on Stackoverflow to this topic:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/50237486/tf-data-iterator-get-next-how-to-advance-in-tf-while-loop
My problem is that I have to assign the new values to my model.

I also tried the following:
```
a = tf.Variable(iterator.get_next())
while (...):
    with tf.control_dependency([tf.assign(a, iterator.get_next())]):
        minimize(...)
```
However, this did not work as well. I still did not get other values in operations using `a`.
Unfortunately my model is too big to share it here.
